data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prokofiev, Artem M., Pietsch, Theodore W. (2019): First Record of the Ceratioid Anglerfish Species Gigantactis microdontis (Teleostei: Lophiiformes: Gigantactinidae) in the Western Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 4664 (3): 441-444, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.3.11|3 occurrences
